1.18.2.1.18.2-1.0.2:
Fixes:
- Fixed forest staff creating doubled ghost block trees
Changes:
- Allowed for custom trees that require silktouch for their drops to desplay it on the waila handler
1.18.2.1.18.2-1.0.0:
At last, the official 1.0 update is out!

New Features:

+ Cocoa species

+ Falling tree sound effects

Changes:

+ Jungle undergrowth leaves are now dynamic bushes

+ Extended reach of staff item for placing trees

+ Internal changes

+ minor changes to conifer growthlogic

+ fruits and pods now show up in waila hud

Fixes:

- fixed seasonal titles not showing up properly with some season handler mods

- fixed bamboo getting cut by mega jungle trees

- fixed air pockets with trees that generate underwater

- other minor fixes
1.18.2.1.18.2-0.11.0-Beta6:
### Enhancements
- Biome populator selectors can now filter by biome tags. 

### Changes
- Feature cancellers are now read from a separate file called `feature_cancellers.json` rather than from the default populators.*
- Added rooty dirt as the snow block's substitute soil.

### Bug Fixes
- Fix some broken resource loading error messages.
- Fix spruce trees spawning in frozen oceans and ice spikes biomes.
- Fix loading error with Patchouli book.

* Due to this change, **any add-ons using feature cancellers will need to be updated**. Therefore, it is recommended that you ensure all add-ons are fully up-to-date. Those maintained under the `DynamicTreesTeam` GitHub have been updated and released alongside this.
1.18.2.1.18.2-0.11.0-Beta5:
### Changes
- Base ground finder on DimensionType#hasCeiling rather than DT biome database.
- Modify chance for nether forests to 1.

### Bug Fixes
- Fix loading issue (#737).
1.18.2.1.18.2-0.11.0-Beta4: Small patch fixing crash when looking at apples and dynamic trees with cocoa beans in multiplayer (#732, #734).
1.18.2.1.18.2-0.11.0-Beta3: Fix branch item names not having `_branch` suffix.
1.18.2.1.18.2-0.11.0-Beta1: Ported 1.16.5 fixes and updates (see 1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta34 for details).
1.18.2.1.18.2-0.11.0-Alpha2:
### Bug Fixes:
- Fix biomes randomly not generating trees.
- Fix rooty block rendering.
- Fix tree not having a common species sapling block.
- Other minor fixes.
1.18.2.1.18.2-0.11.0-Alpha1:
### Initial port of 1.18
This version still lacks many features, such as the azalea trees.

### Changes:
- Added moss, rooted dirt and snow blocks as valid soils.

Massive thanks to Nyfaria and SizableShrimp for doing all of the heavy lifting for this port!
1.18.2.1.18.2-0.11.0-Beta7:
- Fix small mistake in TreeHelper#destroyTree [Harley]
- Add TreeHelper#destroyTree for easier mod integration [Harley]
- Set project name to "Dynamic Trees" [Harley]

1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.5:
Fixes:
- Fixed oak trees spawning in places they shouldn't
Technical:
- Updated seed class to allow for cleaner inheritance
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.2: Small patch fixing crash when looking at dynamic trees with cocoa beans in multiplayer (#734).
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.1: Small patch fixing crash when looking at apple trees in multiplayer (#732).
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta35: Small patch re-enforcing the minimum seasonal drop chance of 15%.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta34:
### Enhancements
- Make fruits and pods data-driven.
- Add `TransitionSaplingToTreeEvent` event.
- Rework drops to use loot tables.
- Many more minor code changes/refinements.

### Fixes
- Fix vanilla trees spawning in villages.
- Fix trees sometimes spawning before structures.
- Fix model incompatibility with Sodium Forge ports.
- Fix substitute soil, and hence remove rooty farmlandâ€™s uninentional existence.
- Fix noise density for Poisson radius selection.
- Fix purge tree command not cleaning up related attached blocks.
- Other minor fixes.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta33:
### Enhancements
- Changed rooty blocks to use getSoilBlockstate for shape, light, and all other properties instead of default blockstate.
- Changed `getHarness` method to include the blockState parameter for `BlocksWithDynamicHardness` (some addons might need updating)
- Added `isValidBranchBlock` method to `Family` class.
- Added some nether plants to the foliage tag.
- General datapack improvements.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta32:
### Bug Fixes
- Prevented client crash when secondary leaves are not fetched properly.
- Fixed `names_or` applier not working properly.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta31:
##### Enhancements:
- Add item tags for bone meal and growth effect.

##### Bug Fixes:
- Fix bush feature only placing leaves if secondary leaves are set.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta30:
##### Bug Fixes:
- Fixed mushroom models being tinted.
- Fixed deserialisation of materials, material colors, and sound types in production environment.
- Fixed crash when breaking sapling on client connected to remote server due to required Species data not being loaded.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta29:
Enhancements:
- Added error message for missing sapling item in seed-sapling recipes.
- Made logging more consistent in certain areas.

Changes:
- Refactored `leafAges` -> `AgeingConfiguration` and `does_age` leaves leaves properties property to `ageing_configuration` to match.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed crash due to bush feature not respecting nullable secondary leaves property.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta28:
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed crash on server startup due to client-only method.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta27:
New Features:
- Growth Logic Kits now have properties. These are work in the same way as those used by gen features and drop creators.

Enhancements:
- Global drop creators can now be defined in the `drop_creators/global` subfolder (relative to `trees/[namespace]`).
- Gen Features, Drop Creators, and Growth Logic Kits can now have configurations defined in their own file (`gen_features/configurations`, `drop_creators/configurations`, and `growth_logic_kits/configurations` respectively, relative to `trees/[namespace]`).
- A lot of code cleanup and refactors.
- Reworked Json deserialisation, error and warning logging should be much more thorough now.
- Added `NOT` operator to Json biome selectors.
- `Configurable#get` is now non-null (calling on a null property causes a crash).

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed root blocks not connecting properly underwater.
- Fix incorrect check causing leaves to force chunk loading (port of #646).

Please note that the following add-ons will need an update due to the code changes in this version. They have each been released simultaneously and so should be uploaded by the time you're reading this. 
- DT+
- DT Atum 2
- DT BOP
- DT BYG
- DT Nature's Aura
- DT Neapolitan
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta26:
New Features:
+ Added `"OR"` and `"AND"` appliers to datapack worldgen biome selectors.
+ Added `"names_or"` applier to datapack worldgen biome selectors.
+ Allowed rooty soils to read blockstate of primitive soil for checking validity and deciding the proper soil block to use.

Enhancements:
- Moved generateDirtBucketRecipes to common config

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed logs and sticks dropping above the max stack size.
- Fixed substitute soils not assigning properly
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta25:
New Features:
+ Added block state, block model, and item model generators.

Enhancements:
+ Accept `shears` ToolType rather than relying on type-bound `ShearsItem` detection.
- GrowthLogicKit.newDirectionSelected now takes `World` and `BlockPos` parameter.
- Shrunk falling tree entity bounding box to reduce lag (culling bounding box is kept large to prevent it disappearing at a distance).

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed crash whilst generating vines (#618).
- Fixed CME whilst exploding a large amount of trees (#620).
- Fixed pathfinding issues around dynamic trees (#592).
- Fixed world ticking exception with SnowRealMagic (#617).
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta24:
New Features:
+ Added mega jungle trees to jungle biomes
+ Added alternativeLeavesGenFeature
+ Added randomPredicateGenFeature
Enhancements:
- Removed vanilla leaves connecting to dynamic trees
- Reverted growPulse command to work instantly again
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed palm type trees not rendering correctly sometimes
- Fixed trunk shell blocks sometimes staying behind when chopping down thick trees
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta23:
Enhancements:
- Built-in integration with Better Weather seasons.
- `preferredSeasonMod` config option for selecting which season provider should be used.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta22:
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed NoSuchElementException when generating a conifer topper.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta21:
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed secondary leaves chance property not being registered to bush gen feature.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta20:
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed crash whilst generating bush gen features.
- Fixed silk touch not dropping leaves.
- Fixed absent wart block drops.

Tree Pack Changes:
- Weighted drop type now uses WeightedList.
- Added `secondary_leaves_chance` property to bush gen feature.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta19:
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed crash with DT Traverse due to bush gen features not having a default property value.

Tree Pack Changes:
- Added `can_craft_sapling_to_seed` and `can_craft_seed_to_sapling` properties to Species for individual control over automatically generated recipes.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta18:
New Features:
- Soil blocks are now defined through Tree Packs.
- Drop creators are now defined through Tree Packs, allowing customization of tree drops.
- Updated Patchouli manual to 2nd edition.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed threading issue due to some modded dimensions being generated on alternate threads.
- Various minor bug fixes.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta17:
New Features:
- Tree branches can now be waterlogged.
- Surface roots can now be waterlogged.
- Added Block and Item tag generators for addons.

Tree Pack Changes:
- Added `fire_proof` property to families.
- Added `max_signal_depth` property to families.
- Added `can_grow_on_ground` property to leaves_properties.
- Added `sapling_name` property to species.
- Added `seed_name` property to species.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta16:
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed tree pack loading order.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta15:
Enhancements:
+ The burgeoning potion now fills fertility when used and persists until fertility depletes instead of running on a timer.
+ Bone meal now restores two points of fertility on application.
+ Added many new custom tags and better integration with vanilla tags. Details can be found here: https://github.com/ferreusveritas/DynamicTrees/wiki/Tags.
Changes:
- Disabled persistence and fertility potions, will be removed entirely in the next version.
- Beehives are now slightly rarer in forests.
Technical Changes:
- Certain species location overrides will now require a separate sapling block to function (to fix crash with Minecolonies).
- Json biome selectors can now filter biomes by their category.
- Json block property appliers can edit the light block property to make blocks like leaves emit light.
- Branch model loaders now automatically default to a thick branch model if the family's maximum branch radius is greater than 8.
- Added Palm species type, leaves properties, and growth logic (for add-ons to access, there are no palm trees in base DT).
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed crash with Minecolonies.
- Fixed harvest multiplier being ineffectual to log drops.
- Fixed dynamic leaves dropping primitive leaves when broken without shears.
- Fixed dynamic birch leaves colours not being changed by serene seasons.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta14:
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed density selectors - forests should now be as dense as they were in 1.12. 
- Fixed trees not spawning in modified wooded badlands.
- Fixed loot tables support for certain blocks (temporary until drop creators are made). 
- Fixed not clearing model caches which caused a memory leak.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta13:
Enhancements:
- Added config option for whether or not the player can bone meal a tree.
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed commands not being registered on server reload, meaning they would disappear. 
- Fixed trunk shell hardness bug. 
- Fixed trunk shell not disappearing on neighbour update.
- Fixed potted dynamic sapling consuming items in creative mode. 
- Fixed bug where tree generation would be cancelled by grass or ferns.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta12:
Enhancements:
- Updated lang files for spanish and french
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed thick logs being transparent
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta11:
Enhancements:
- Error logging and language improvements
- Added bare cell kit for use in addons
- Other minor improvements
Bug fixes:
- Fixed season seed labels being incorrectly assigned
- Prevented bee nests from filling forests over time
- Other minor fixes
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta10:
Enhancements:
- Internal changes to tree fall animation for extra add-on capabilities. 
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed vanilla tree cancellers.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta9:
Enhancements:
+ Create's tree fertiliser now gives the same effect as a burgeoning potion.
- Updated Spanish translation [translated by Jorgegiral].
- Updated Mexican Spanish translation [translated by EdicionGamerYT].
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed apple trees not spawning in world gen (due to absent JoCodes). 
- Fixed two config options having the same ID, making configuration of seed drops rates inaccessible. 
- Fixed potted sapling not having a localisation.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta8:
Enhancements:
+ Added rooty terracotta. 
+ Rooty blocks can now use custom colour multipliers.
+ Added localisations for staff tooltips. 
- Updated French translation [translated by @19PixelsPlaced]
+ The trunk shell block can now be waterlogged. 
Tree Packs:
- Improvements to how tree packs are reloaded.
+ The registry name of the generated leaves block can be changed in the leaves properties Json via block_registry_name. 
+ Additional "valid" leaves can now be added to the species Json via valid_leaves. 
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException with the tree falling animation.
- Fixed CraftTweaker incompatibility. 
- Fixed an issue where primitive logs and sticks couldn't be found from other mods.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta7:
Enhancements:
- Added Polish translation. [PR from SubcarpathianSkull]
- Added soil life argument to /dt settree.
- Improved nether worldgen
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed trees being unbreakable in multiplayer servers
- Fixed crashes related to ConcurrentModificationExcpetions.
- Fixed dynamic tree configured feature not being registered properly.

1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.29:
##### Bug Fixes:
- Fixed update tracker not working
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.28:
##### New Features:
- Added BoneMealHelper to manage new bonemeal-like items
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.27:
##### Bug Fixes:
- Fix incorrect check causing leaves to force chunk loading.
- Fixed trees consuming all potion items if they're stackable.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.26:
Changes:
- Bumped minimum Forge version to 14.23.5.2860.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed arrows shot at dynamic leaves floating.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.25:
Enhancements:
- Added action bar error messages to certain common potion application failures.
- Shrunk falling tree entity bounding box to reduce lag (culling bounding box is kept large to prevent it disappearing at a distance).

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed incompatibility with SnowRealMagic that caused "ghost blocks" to spawn on trees in place of snow layers.
- Fixed log spam `X not valid leaves for Y.` due to not checking leaves are valid before destroying.
- Fixed crash when using name array selector in worldgen Json.
- Fixed potions only being consumed if they used lingering effects.
- Fix incompatibility crash with Hardcore Item Stages.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.24:
New Features:
- Added tall birch species, generates in the mutated birch forest.
- Added Mega Jungle species to world gen.
- Added not operator for name selectors in Json biome database populators.
- Added array name selector in Json biome database populators.

Enhancements:
- Bone meal restores two points of fertility (up from one point).
- Added config option for how many growth pulses bone meal sends.
- The burgeoning potion restores all fertility and then speeds up growth until fertility runs out instead of running on a timer.
- Families can now customise max signal depth without having to create a new BranchBlock.
- Added Polish translation. [by SubcarpathianSkull]
- Optimised assets. [by RDKRACZ]

Changes:
- Effectively removed fertility and persistence potions (no longer obtainable, ones previously crafted will still exist).

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed biome selector blacklist checking for all match instead of any match.
- Fixed crash with falling tree physics.
- Fixed dynamic leaves not dropping when broken with silk touch.
- Fixed incompatibility with Jurassicraft that caused missing texture blocks to spawn in place of vines.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.23:
New Features:
- Added functionality for the type selector to negate biomes using '!' in JSON worldgen.
Enhancements:
- Added validLeavesBlocks and validBranches system to trees allowing Addons to configure multiple blocks to be rendered during tree felling animation. (Back-ported from 1.16.5)
- Added colorTreeQuads method on species to allow Addons to customize the coloring of tree quads.
- Added showSpeciesOnWaila method on Species to allow addons to toggle the waila display if needed. (Back-ported from 1.16.5)
- Added Waila display handler for rooty water blocks.
- Added setMegaSpecies mehtod on species class to allow Addons to add Mega variants to existing species. (Back-ported from 1.16.5)
Bugs Fixed:
- Added dimensionForceGeneration predicate to fix an issue where sky-like dimensions would not generate trees under certain circumstances.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.22:
New Features:
- Added /dt transform for transforming tree species.
- Added /dt createtransformpotion for spawning in transformation potions.
- Added localisations for potion descriptions, season tooltips, and staff tooltips.
- Added config options for disabling components of seasons compatibility.
Enhancements:
- Transformation potions recipes for add-ons trees are now auto-created.
- Updated the Patchouli guide book with fixes and new pages.
- Updated various localisation files. [PRs from Smollet777]
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed incompatibility for Pyrotechâ€™s extra stick drops.
- Fixed Barretone bot crash. [PR from C0bra5]
- Fixed tinkerâ€™s construct mattock not taking custom damage.
- Fixed certain commands not working when targeting a thick branch.
- Fixed Mekanism flamethrower crash.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.21:
New Features:
- Make season manager position sensitive for more complex climate models(such as TFC)
Bug Fixes:
- Fix species for location saplin transition problem(only affects certain add-ons)
- Re-add deprecated function for compatibility with primitive mobs
-Â Re-add deprecated addAcceptableSoil as an empty function for compatibility with underground biomes
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.20:
New Features:
- Greatly improve resistance to rare distorted tree models during worldgen
- Enhanced rooty dirt mimic capabilities with new DirtHelper system
- Admin commands to remove trees from chunks or clean up orphaned nodes
Bug Fixes:
- Fix Tooltip crash
- Fix nether generation density issues for add-on mods
Internal:
- Removed some deprecated methods
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.19:
New Features:
-Add support API functionality for Add-ons
 Bug Fixes:
-Fixed stack overflow crash
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.18:
New Features:
- Created soil registry system.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.17:
New Features:
- API support for new Dynamic Trees PHC Add-on feature.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.16:
New Features:
- Add alternative snow layer block that forms on leaves(disabled by default) for the purpose of shader waving or custom models.
- Add config option for giant mushrooms spawning in roofed forests (enabled by default).
- Internal API additions for add-ons.

Bugs Fixed:
- Transformations potions are not consumed if the target species already matches the potion species.
- Add checks to prevent runaway mimic recursion causing a client side crash under rare circumstances.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.15:
New Features:
- Added patchouli manual.
- Added forge mod update checking.

Bugs Fixed:
- Fixed concurrent modification exception crash during block breaking.
- Fixed concurrent modification exception crash during multiple explosions.
- Fixed "perma-shrub" bug that occured if doDayLightCycle was false.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.14:
New Features:
- Removed "Dynamic" prefix from localized branch names.
- Species name localizations (please be patient while add-ons catch up, species names will be unlocalized until new add-on releases are made with updated lang files).

Bugs Fixed:
- Dimensions other than 0 now grow trees properly again (bug introduced by Serene Seasons integration effort).
- Made rooty dirt blocks get color from mimic instead of grass (thanks Max Hyper).
- Fix optifine shader interaction bug where sky could be seen through breaking texture on trees.
- Fixed small crash with cactus model (thanks Max Hyper).

Internal:
- Enhanced SeasonHelper capabilities with helper functions.
- Removed "Wrapped" classes and redefined blockstate files to be more standard.
- Don't throw an exception when a JoCode file isn't defined.

1.19.2.1.19.2-1.1.0-BETA4:
- Bump to BETA 4, fix auto update tool [Harley]
- Fix burgeoning potion not lingering [Harley]
- Change version type to beta [Harley]
